# JAX dependencies for high-performance computing
# Generated from pyproject.toml [project.optional-dependencies.jax]
# Last updated: v0.7.1 (Windows compatibility and pre-commit hooks)

# Include core dependencies
-r requirements.txt

# JAX for high-performance numerical computations
jax>=0.7.0
jaxlib>=0.4.35

# Note: For GPU support, install jaxlib with CUDA support:
# pip install "jax[cuda]" -f https://storage.googleapis.com/jax-releases/jax_cuda_releases.html
#
# For TPU support:
# pip install "jax[tpu]" -f https://storage.googleapis.com/jax-releases/libtpu_releases.html
#
# For CPU-only (default):
# pip install jax jaxlib
